bike.description: Specialized A1 Premium Aluminum, fully butted, tapered head tube, forged BB shell w/ integrated ISCG tabs, forged horizontal drop-outs w/ integrated chain tensioners

components.description: Integrated 1-1/8" upper and 1-1/2" lower threadless, Campy-style, full cartridge bearings
Collar, single and multispeed hardware, owner's manual
